Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
```
echo '{"method":"blockchain.transaction.get","params":["bcded351e33d530a07deebeeee3b7ae328e9636e3cfab72eadace6bb6945e693", true],"id":"test"}' | nc electrum1.cipig.net 10031 -i 1 | jq .
```
^ to query an electrum server over a terminal

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: thanks, I didn't know it's possible to query the electrum servers directly w/o proxying the request

Content: yeah, I was trying to use curl, but found out eletrum servers don't respond to http requests
